about_the_game:
┏―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―┓
A massive downloadable data pack is coming to HoneyCome come come party,
the game that breathed new life into the 3D character creation scene!
┗―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―┛
HoneyCome come come dolce is a large-scale downloadable data pack for HoneyCome come come party
that powers up the base game with a wide array of new features,
and even includes the new Digital Craft system.


┏―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―┓
Two brand-new character personalities!
New outfits, hair, accessories, and of course
new maps and sex scenes are included as well!
┗―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―┛
Purchasing HoneyCome come come dolce will add two new character personalities
to the game: Tsundere and Japanese Ideal.

"It will also add new hair, clothing, accessories,
and more to character creation."

New maps are included as well, and other bonuses such as tentacle sex!
In short, this data pack ratchets up the fun in HoneyCome come come party!


┏―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―┓
Digital Craft is a hobby soft that lets you freely position, observe,
"and record scenes in the game. Use characters, maps, and items
to create your own digital dioramas!"
┗―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―┛
Digital Craft allows you to take your favorite characters
from HoneyCome come come party and:

・Pose them however you'd like
・Bestow upon them compelling expressions
・Give them props and weapons
・And place them wherever you'd like on your chosen map!

With dynamic motion and fully 360 degree scenes,
you can record videos that show your favorite moments
"using your favorite angles, and live the dream of being
a master movie director!"


Whether daily life, science fiction, fantasy or more,
you can create the world you want to see, then film it for posterity!


┏―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―┓
A tremendous array of preset motions and poses
lets anyone have fun creating easy-to-build scenes!
┗―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―┛
Using the default preset poses and motions allows you to
easily create scenes and take fun screenshots that show off your art.

And of course, what scene is complete without lighting?
"Control the lights, make camera action, then tweak your models'
poses down to their fingertips to get everything just perfect."

You can even load your own images to use as scene backgrounds.
Pose your favorite character, slap them on the perfect background,
and create your own original gravure photo shoot!


┏―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―┓
The possibilities are as close to infinite as you can get!
"Adjust each model's pose down to the fingertips to
create the ultimate look!"
┗―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―┛
Line of sight, head tilt, body type, arms and legs and more...
"Everything is fully posable, all the way down to each individual finger.
With this carefully developed labor of love, you can create any
pose your heart desires."

You can even adjust individual segments of hair or parts of clothing.
"Adjust these to match a pose, and you'll be able to create dynamic
scenes that feel like they're ready to leap off the screen!"


┏―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―┓
Use our scene uploader to share your creations
with users around the world!
┗―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―━―┛
With our scene uploader, you can share the scenes and
screenshots you create with others all around the world.
And of course, you can also download and view scene data as well,
"which can be fun in its own right, and give you ideas on how to
brush up your own scene creation technique!"

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is entirely a work of fiction.
Any names, organizations, locations, or events appearing in this game are fictitious.
Any resemblance to real names, organizations, locations, events, etc. is purely coincidental.
This game is a work of imagination and fantasy, and above all else, just a game.
Attempting to perform the actions seen in this game in real life may result in criminal litigation or arrest.
Do NOT attempt to mimic or reproduce the things you see in this game in real life.
All characters appearing in this game are over the age of 18.

This game contains direct depictions of sexual acts, nudity, and other mature content of a sexual nature.

Player discretion is advised.

Be aware that all acts depicted in this game, sexual and otherwise, are consensual. However, certain scenes contain sexual roleplay that may involve themes of moderate violence, such as sexual spanking and BDSM. If you believe these depictions may cause you distress, please do not play this game.

Additionally, this game does NOT contain depictions of graphic violence, sexual assault, drug or alcohol abuse, criminal behavior, self-harm, suicide, or other similar topics.

name: HoneyCome come come party dolce

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy HoneyCome come come party dolce

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 / 11 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core ｉ3 8100 serise or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 Series or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 Series (VRAM 3GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires an Internet connection.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 / 11 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core ｉ7 8700 serise or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 Series or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 Series (VRAM 6GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires an Internet connection.

short_description: HoneyCome come come party dolce is a large-scale downloadable data pack for HoneyCome come come party that powers up the base game with a wide array of new features, and even includes the new Digital Craft system.
